text: Va ej camoati jahudijon, ʙesak donisted on guruhro, ki ruzi sanʙe az haddi xud tacovuz kardand, ja'ne hilae andesidand ruzi sanʙe ʙaroi sajd kardani mohiho va tur guzostand va xandaqe kandand, to mohihoro ʙa dast ovarand. Va ruzi jaksanʙe mohihoi sajdsudaro giriftand. Zero sajdi ruzi sanʙe ʙarojason harom ʙud. Pas ʙa onho xitoʙ kardem: «Majmunhoi xorsuda ʙosed!»
